definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Euphonic is with amuse of, the voice also has no to heave and fall too greatly.
sentences.chinese: 語調是隨興的，聲音也沒有太大的起伏。

sentences.english: He advises girls’ teachers to watch the tone of their voices.
sentences.chinese: 他建議女孩的老師注意他們的聲音語調。

sentences.english: Being able to say simple sentences in correct stresses and intonations.
sentences.chinese: 能以正確的重音及語調說出簡單的句子。

sentences.english: The achievement of the expressive intonations for concatenative speech synthesis may be based on the layered corpus.
sentences.chinese: 數據庫爲實現表情語調的拼接合成奠定了基礎。

sentences.english: The tone was bitter and accusatory.
sentences.chinese: 語調是埋怨責怪的那種。

sentences.english: "That's all, young man, " he said, his tone abrupt, official.
sentences.chinese: “這樣吧，年輕人，”他語調粗魯，還帶着官腔。

sentences.english: She parted from her young friend in the kindliest tones.
sentences.chinese: 她用最和藹可親的語調和她的年輕的朋友道了別。

sentences.english: The condemnatory tone of many postings has prompted some commentators to turn on the gossipers.
sentences.chinese: 很多譴責語調的帖子引起一些評論員轉向緋聞。

sentences.english: The exclamatory markers are especially important for the recognition of the non-typical exclamatory intonation.
sentences.chinese: 感嘆標記對於非典型感嘆語調的判別有重要作用。

sentences.english: Tess answered back in the same annoyed tone.
sentences.chinese: 泰絲用同樣不耐煩的語調答到。

sentences.english: Ridicule is Wang Shuo"s special feature language type."
sentences.chinese: 調侃式語言是王朔小說獨具特色的話語調式。

sentences.english: His speech is slow and robotic, as if he is searching for every word.
sentences.chinese: 他說話語速很慢，語調機械，似乎每一個詞都要斟酌。

sentences.english: In other words, their goal in learning intonation is not clearly defined.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，他們在語調學習上處於無的放矢的狀態。

sentences.english: The chairman droned on for hours.
sentences.chinese: 主席一直以沉悶的語調講了幾小時。

sentences.english: You can't get yourself familiar with English pronunciation or accent just from listenning to English songs.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只是聽英文歌，你就不會熟悉英語語音語調。

definition: tone/note/a tone (on a Chinese syllable)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to sketch in light shades/to play down/to deemphasize (idiom)
wording/way of expressing something/turn of phrase/diction
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
